description.value: A surgical action addressing a cancer condition. The scope of this profile has been narrowed to cancer-related procedures by constraining the reasonReference and reasonCode to cancer conditions, one of which is required.

human.value: One of reasonCode or reasonReference SHALL be present

short.value: 主手術(處置)代碼 - 中文說明
就醫日期/治療結束日期/入院年月日/出院年月日，使用Period(start: TOTFA.d9, TOTFB.d10; end: TOTFA.d10, TOTFB.d11)
General location qualifier (excluding laterality) for this bodySite

definition.value: General location qualifier (excluding laterality) for this bodySite

short.value: Laterality qualifier (excluding laterality) for this bodySite

definition.value: Laterality qualifier (excluding laterality) for this bodySite

short.value: TOTFA.d25, TOTFA.d26, TOTFB.d46, TOTFB.d47, TOTFB.d48, TOTFB.d49
次手術(處置)代碼 - 中文說明
